name: Debt Dilemma
title: High Debt Service Burden
description: In 2023, Pakistan's debt service, including PPG and IMF, accounted for 37% of its exports of goods, services, and primary income, indicating a significant financial burden.

name: Business Blues
title: Struggling Business Infrastructure
description: In 2024, Pakistan scored 3.33 on the B-READY Business Insolvency Pillar 2, reflecting challenges in the quality of institutional and operational infrastructure for judicial insolvency proceedings.

name: Health Hazard
title: Rising Diabetes Prevalence
description: As of 2021, 30.8% of Pakistan's population aged 20 to 79 was affected by diabetes, highlighting a growing health concern.

name: Trade Troubles
title: Low Import Unit Value Index
description: In 2023, Pakistan's import unit value index stood at 67.1, indicating a decrease in the value of imported goods compared to 2015.

name: Financial Flow Freeze
title: Negative Net Financial Flows
description: In 2023, Pakistan experienced a negative net financial flow of -301,228,000 USD in RDB concessional funds, suggesting financial outflows surpassing inflows.

name: Health Protection Gap
title: Minimal Use of Insecticide-Treated Nets
description: In 2018, only 0.4% of Pakistan's under-5 population used insecticide-treated bed nets, indicating a gap in malaria prevention measures.
